entry.title: SAP TechEd 2025: Your Must-Attend Sessions on SAP BTP
entry.content:
It feels like I came back from SAP Connect just yesterday, but SAP TechEd is now less than two weeks away. In addition to the virtual event, SAP TechEd 2025 will be held in five different cities and offer hundreds of sessions. Here‚Äôs my guide to the must-attend sessions for AI agents, SAP Business Technology Platform architecture, Extensions, and Integration across the world, as well as Virtual.

 

Why SAP TechEd 2025 is Unmissable

The enterprise technology landscape is evolving at breakneck speed, and SAP TechEd 2025 promises to be the defining moment where cutting-edge innovation meets hands-on expertise. This is the leading event for developers and IT professionals ready to explore SAP's most transformative technologies and emerge with skills that deliver measurable impact from day one.

SAP TechEd

  • SAP TechEd Berlin (November 4-6, 2025) offers the flagship in-person experience where you'll connect directly with SAP experts, participate in hands-on workshops, and build lasting professional relationships within the global SAP community
  • SAP TechEd Virtual (November 4-6, 2025) provides the same high-quality technical content online for free for maximum accessibility, allowing you to explore the latest innovations in application development, integration, data, and AI from anywhere in the world

SAP TechEd on Tour

The SAP TechEd on Tour series delivers localized, immersive experiences tailored to regional technical communities. Each event combines the core SAP TechEd experience with region-specific insights, local expert networks, and formats optimized for different technical communities and career advancement goals.

  • ASUG Tech Connect in Louisville, KY (November 4-6) focuses on practical skills for North American practitioners
  • Mastering SAP in Sydney, Australia (November 12-14) brings together Asia-Pacific technical experts for intensive learning and networking
  • SAP TechEd on Tour Bangalore, India (November 25-26) offers hands-on workshops and certification boot camps designed for the thriving Indian developer community
  • DSAG TechXchange 2026 in Hamburg, Germany (March 19) provides specialized DevOps-focused sessions for European technical professionals

 

Must-Attend Sessions at SAP TechEd 2025

Don't miss these carefully curated sessions that will give you the deepest insights into SAP's technology roadmap and hands-on skills you can immediately apply. Here are my top recommendations for SAP TechEd Berlin, Virtual, and ASUG Tech Connect, organized by city and focus area:

SAP TechEd Berlin & Virtual

üèóÔ∏è Platform Strategy & Architecture

  • ST126 | Understanding our strategy for SAP BTP: The big picture: Get the executive overview of SAP's unified platform strategy directly from the Head of BTP Product Management. This is essential for understanding how all SAP technologies connect. 
    üóìÔ∏èADD NOW ‚Äì BERLIN | üóìÔ∏èADD NOW ‚Äì VIRTUAL

  • XP100 | Accelerate adoption of SAP Business Technology Platform with confidence: Learn practical implementation approaches using SAP's Architecture Center and Discovery Center resources. Perfect for planning your BTP adoption strategy. 
    üóìÔ∏èADD NOW ‚Äì BERLIN | üóìÔ∏èADD NOW ‚Äì VIRTUAL

ü§ñ AI & AI Agents

  • AD202 | Orchestrating enterprise automation with custom AI agents: Build custom AI agents from scratch in Joule Studio and integrate them with SAP Build Process Automation. Features real customer use cases from Uniper Energy
    üóìÔ∏èADD NOW ‚Äì BERLIN | üóìÔ∏èADD NOW ‚Äì VIRTUAL

  • AD819 | What's new for process automation, Joule skills, and agents in SAP Build: Learn how enterprise automation is evolving from structured workflows to intelligent, autonomous experiences, and how Joule Studio supports custom skill and agent creation for AI-driven process transformation.
    üóìÔ∏èADD NOW ‚Äì BERLIN | üóìÔ∏èADD NOW ‚Äì VIRTUAL

  • AI102 | Boosting business efficiency with AI innovations in document processing: Discover how SAP Document AI automates structured and unstructured document processing with cutting-edge AI technologies. 
    üóìÔ∏èADD NOW ‚Äì BERLIN | üóìÔ∏èADD NOW ‚Äì VIRTUAL

  • AI105 | Building custom AI agents and skills with Joule Studio: You can learn how to create, deploy, and manage agents tailored to your business needs‚Äîfeaturing live demos and a walkthrough of key capabilities for developers and IT teams.
    üóìÔ∏èADD NOW ‚Äì BERLIN | üóìÔ∏èADD NOW ‚Äì VIRTUAL

  • IN200 | Empower your agents to be responsible: Understand AI agent governance and security through SAP Integration Suite's API Management capabilities.
    üóìÔ∏èADD NOW ‚Äì BERLIN | üóìÔ∏èADD NOW ‚Äì VIRTUAL

üíª Application Development & Automation

  • AD820 | Future of app dev in SAP Build: Simplifying clean core and LoB extensions: Get exclusive previews of upcoming SAP Build enhancements including Joule copilot integration and improved developer productivity tools. 
    üóìÔ∏èADD NOW ‚Äì BERLIN | üóìÔ∏èADD NOW ‚Äì VIRTUAL

  • AD104 | Boost your ABAP development with SAP Joule for Developers: Learn how AI is transforming ABAP development with SAP Joule, from code acceleration to custom AI scenario development.
    üóìÔ∏èADD NOW ‚Äì BERLIN | üóìÔ∏èADD NOW ‚Äì VIRTUAL

  • IN160 | Empower your business through enterprise automation: Get hands-on experience combining SAP Integration Suite with SAP Build and SAP Signavio solutions. Learn to create automation-based integrations powered by AI capabilities and prebuilt content to drive process innovation.
    üóìÔ∏èADD NOW ‚Äì BERLIN

 üîó Integration

  • IN100 | Make your enterprise future ready with SAP Integration Suite: Essential for anyone migrating from SAP PI/PO to SAP Integration Suite. Covers tools, best practices, and technical challenges with real-world insights. 
    üóìÔ∏èADD NOW ‚Äì BERLIN | üóìÔ∏èADD NOW ‚Äì VIRTUAL

üîí Security & Compliance

  • XP802 | Road map for security and compliance services in SAP BTP: Stay ahead of security requirements with upcoming BTP security features, identity management, and compliance enhancements. 
    üóìÔ∏èADD NOW ‚Äì BERLIN | üóìÔ∏èADD NOW ‚Äì VIRTUAL

  • ST104 | Unlocking value with the multi-cloud foundation for SAP BTP: Learn about platform administration, custom application lifecycle management, and SAP BTP‚Äôs business focus for enterprise-grade, hybrid landscapes.
    üóìÔ∏èADD NOW ‚Äì BERLIN

  • XP207 | Mastering zero trust: SAP Customer Identity and Access Management: Use policies and tools in SAP Customer Identity and Access Management to protect customers‚Äô accounts and access while delivering zero trust‚Äîready applications.
    üóìÔ∏èADD NOW ‚Äì BERLIN

 

ASUG Tech Connect - Louisville, KY

üèóÔ∏è Platform Strategy & Architecture

  • Introduction to SAP Business Technology Platform: Get a complete overview of SAP Business Technology Platform (BTP) to explore the full potential of the platform. üóìÔ∏èREAD NOW

  • Hands-on Lab: Accelerate adoption of SAP Business Technology Platform with confidence: Gain hands-on experience in accelerating your adoption of SAP BTP with SAP Discovery Center, a single point of entry for BTP and Business AI knowledge assets. üóìÔ∏èREAD NOW

ü§ñAI & AI Agents

  • AI-Powered Document Automation: Accelerate SAP Processes with Confidence: We will share real-world examples of global companies using SAP Business Technology Platform (BTP) to streamline document processing, improve data accuracy, and achieve measurable results in a matter of weeks. üóìÔ∏èREAD NOW

  • Hands-on Lab: Build Your Own AI Solution with the Generative AI Hub: Get hands-on experience building a custom AI solution with the generative AI hub capability in AI Foundation. üóìÔ∏èREAD NOW

  • Hands-on Lab: Get Hands-on Experience to Extend Joule and Build AI Agents: Get hands-on experience with Joule Studio to extend Joule technology with custom skills and build AI agents. üóìÔ∏èREAD NOW

  • Extend Joule with Custom Skills and Custom Agents for SAP Cloud ERP: Get maximum value from the Joule copilot in SAP Cloud ERP by extending it with custom-built skills and intelligent agents that can plan, act, and execute tasks. üóìÔ∏èREAD NOW       

  • Discovery Workshop: Start Your AI Agent Journey by Exploring AI Agent Use Cases: Explore how AI Agent capabilities can address your specific business challenges and learn the next steps for designing and building an AI Agent using the SAP Agent Builder. üóìÔ∏èREAD NOW
  • Hands-on Lab: Get hands-on with Joule, Boost your SAP Build Development with AI: Get hands-on experience using AI-driven tools to boost your productivity in SAP Cloud Application Programming Model and UI development, with features designed to simplify your workflow and help you build faster and smarter. üóìÔ∏èREAD NOW          

 üíª Application Development & Automation

  • SAP Build: Latest Innovations and Road Map: Explore the strategic road map for the SAP Build portfolio and see how recent and upcoming innovations in low-code and pro-code tools are transforming application development, process automation, and business site design. üóìÔ∏èREAD NOW

  • Introduction to Application Development and Automation: Learn how the key capabilities, recent innovations, and road map for SAP‚Äôs application development and automation solutions enable you to build, extend, and automate apps quickly. üóìÔ∏èREAD NOW

 üîó Integration

  • Introduction to Integration: Harness AI to Future-Proof Your Integration Investment: Essential for anyone migrating from SAP PI/PO to SAP Integration Suite. Covers tools, best practices, and technical challenges with real-world insights. üóìÔ∏èREAD NOW

  • ASUG Community Conversations- SAP Integration in SAP Business Technology Platform: Connect with SAP experts and the ASUG Community as they share their experiences, solutions, and strategies. üóìÔ∏èREAD NOW

  • Innovations, Investments, and Future Road Map for SAP Integration Suite: Explore recent innovations across API management, event-driven architecture, B2B integration, hybrid deployment models, and AI-driven automation. üóìÔ∏èREAD NOW

 üîí Security & Compliance

  • Explore Security Services with SAP BTP: Explore the extensive capabilities of SAP BTP in security, identity, and access management. üóìÔ∏èREAD NOW

 

Register. Attend. Reap Results.

The sessions above represent hours of curated content distilled into the most impactful learning opportunities to deliver technical knowledge at SAP TechEd 2025. You'll get architecture frameworks, implementation strategies, and direct access to the platform's subject matter experts. Whether you're migrating integrations, deploying AI agents, or hardening security, these sessions answer your actual questions. And of course, you can't miss the keynotes at SAP TechEd to explore how SAP's newest technologies and capabilities will bring in results:

SAP TechEd - Berlin & Virtual

  • KEY100 | Beyond the hype: How SAP is supercharging developers for what's next: Explore how the latest technology, tools, AI, agents, and learning from SAP can help you adapt to these changing roles. 
    üóìÔ∏èADD NOW ‚Äì BERLIN | üóìÔ∏èADD NOW ‚Äì VIRTUAL

  • KEY101 | Draft day for developers: Turning new technology into real-world wins: Explore how you can use SAP‚Äôs newest AI capabilities, generative agents, and enhanced tooling to build faster and smarter with less friction and more impact.
    üóìÔ∏èADD NOW ‚Äì BERLIN | üóìÔ∏èADD NOW ‚Äì VIRTUAL

  • KEY103 | SAP TechEd closing: Wrap up SAP TechEd with highlights, key takeaways, and a look at what‚Äôs ahead. From breakthrough demos to developer wins, celebrate what you‚Äôve learned, where you‚Äôve connected, and how you can keep the momentum going long after SAP TechEd is over.
    üóìÔ∏èADD NOW ‚Äì BERLIN | üóìÔ∏èADD NOW ‚Äì VIRTUAL

 ASUG Tech Connect - Louisville, KY

  • Shaping What‚Äôs Next: Insights from SAP, Databricks, and Customers: Join ASUG CEO Geoff Scott as he sits down with leaders from SAP, Databricks, and SAP customers to unpack the big themes driving transformation, from cloud and AI to business change and innovation. üóìÔ∏èREAD NOW

  • In the Spotlight: Partner-Customer Stories That Move SAP Forward: You‚Äôll hear directly from three SAP partners and their customers as they take the stage together to share how they tackled tough challenges, achieved measurable outcomes, and transformed their business through SAP solutions. üóìÔ∏èREAD NOW

 

Register now, add these sessions to your agenda, and come with your toughest problems.

entry.title: SAP TechEd Sessions in Berlin and Sydney 2025 by KP Sauer
entry.content:
SAP TechEd 2025

One more week to #SAPTechEd 2025.
I am super excited ‚ú® to speak at this year‚Äôs SAP TechEd in Berlin, and also in Sydney for SAP TechEd on Tour.

ü§© Looking forward to meet and talk to all you data and analytics experts in Berlin or Sydney.

Join me for a variety of sessions this year and gain a comprehensive understanding of our strategic direction and priorities with SAP Business Data Cloud.

 

SAP TechEd in Berlin

Deep Dive Sessions

‚û°Ô∏è  DA204 | The impact of SAP Business Data Cloud on SAP Datasphere users

This session is for all users of SAP Datasphere to better understand the impact with SAP Business Data Cloud and the new options you get within such a new landscape. Rithivika Acharya will give you a demo and we will have some time for Q&A at the end

üîó  https://www.sap.com/events/teched/berlin/flow/sap/te25/catalog-inperson/page/catalog/session/1753913915410001RQyH

 

‚û°Ô∏è  DA203 | SAP Business Data Cloud: The path forward for SAP Business Warehouse

This session is for all users of SAP BW or BW/4HANA to better understand the impact with SAP Business Data Cloud and exploring the best practices for modernizing with such a new landscape. Domink Kurz will mainly talk here and we will have some time for Q&A at the end.

üîó  https://www.sap.com/events/teched/berlin/flow/sap/te25/catalog-inperson/page/catalog/session/1753910209205001V1Vm

 

Hands-on Workshop

‚û°Ô∏è  DA264 | SAP Business Data Cloud: Explore the analytical components end to end

This beginner hands-on workshop takes you through the analytical components of the SAP Business Data Cloud solution. Use the SAP Datasphere and SAP Analytics Cloud solutions to design and build custom scenarios from beginning to end. This session is ideal for technical users seeking to transform data into meaningful business insights. I will be hosting this together with Hannes Keil, Daniel Ingenhaag and Florian Neukirch.

üîó  https://www.sap.com/events/teched/berlin/flow/sap/te25/catalog-inperson/page/catalog/session/1754056240863001fO9w

 

Are you ready? üëâ Register now: https://www.sap.com/events/teched.html

 

SAP TechEd on Tour in Sydney

In Sydney I will be talking live about üöÄ

‚û°Ô∏è  DA806 | SAP Business Data Cloud Solution Road Map

Join me and gain a comprehensive understanding of our strategic direction and priorities with SAP Business Data Cloud. Find out about the product road map and ongoing development in key areas. Learn about our plans to continue to deliver innovation to aid in your data strategy.

 

‚û°Ô∏è  DA100 | An Introduction to SAP Business Data Cloud

Join us for an insightful overview of SAP Business Data Cloud. Discover the key capabilities including seamless integration of SAP and non-SAP data sources, the data product concept, and analytics-ready data across your organization. Learn how SAP Business Data Cloud supports agile decision-making, simplifies complex data challenges, and drives digital transformation.

 

Other than these sessions I will be around the show floor and support hands-on sessions too.
So please be welcome to talk to me as I‚Äôm happy to share my SAP experience during the three days üì¢

Passes to Mastering SAP Collaborate, an SAP TechEd on Tour event, are available online now ‚Äì join me in Sydney on 12 ‚Äì 14 November!

Program and passes at http://sapteched.sydney and best of all you can use code SPEAKER5OFF to save 5% on a pass.

üóì  When: 12 - 14 November 2025

üìç  Where: International Convention Centre, ICC, Darling Harbour, Sydney

 

Related community topic pages:

SAP Business Data Cloud | SAP Community

SAP Datasphere | SAP Community

SAP Analytics Cloud | SAP Community

 

Looking forward to seeing you in Berlin and Sydney!

 

Now let‚Äôs hear from you

  • What is your favorite feature in SAP Datasphere?
  • Do you already have any plans for SAP Business Data Cloud or are you waiting to adopt?

 Please add your thoughts as comments to this blog. Thanks!

entry.title: Join the Community Talks at SAP TechEd Berlin 2025 in the Community Theatre!
entry.content:
SAP TechEd Berlin 2025 is just around the corner ‚Äî and this year‚Äôs program is packed with opportunities to learn, connect, and grow alongside fellow SAP community members.

Among the many highlights on the agenda, one area you won‚Äôt want to miss is the Community Theatre‚Äî a space where the SAP community itself takes the stage to share real experiences, creative ideas, and practical insights through Community Talks.

‚ÄÉ

What Are SAP Community Talks?

Community Talks are short, 20-minute sessions designed for open knowledge sharing. Presented by community members, SAP experts, and partners, they bring real-world stories and lessons learned directly to the heart of SAP TechEd.

These talks complement the full TechEd experience ‚Äî from keynotes and deep dives to hands-on workshops ‚Äî by offering a more conversational, interactive format that celebrates collaboration and peer learning.

Each session offers something a little different: a success story, a trivia contest, a technical challenge overcome, a clever shortcut, or a spark of inspiration that others can build on.

Why You Should Attend

  • Learn from peers. Hear firsthand how others are using SAP technologies ‚Äî from SAP BTP and SAP Build to AI and data analytics ‚Äî to solve real-world problems.
  • Get inspired. Walk away with fresh ideas, lessons learned, and tangible takeaways you can apply immediately.
  • Connect with others. Meet passionate community members, developers, and advocates in an open, friendly space - in the SAP Community Clubhouse - where discussion is encouraged.

üëâRead: 9 things you need to know about SAP Community at SAP TechEd in Berlin

The Community Talks Line-Up at SAP TechEd Berlin 2025

Here‚Äôs the full list of Community Talks happening in Berlin ‚Äî each one a unique opportunity to learn from and engage with the SAP community.

üëâ SAP TechEd Berlin 2025 ‚Äî Community Talks Catalog

Make the Most of It

Community Talks are all about interaction ‚Äî so don‚Äôt be shy! Bring your questions, share your own experiences, and connect with speakers and fellow attendees afterward. These sessions often spark some of the most meaningful conversations of the entire event.

See You in Berlin!

entry.title: CAP at SAP TechEd 2025
entry.content:
Dear SAP community,

SAP TechEd 2025 is almost there! This year, SAP TechEd is a hybrid event: from November 4 ‚Äì 6 you can either join the in-person event in Berlin or the online event SAP TechEd Virtual. Hundreds of sessions, hands-on workshops, and networking opportunities are waiting for you.

If you didn‚Äôt already do it, save the date and register today: SAP TechEd Berlin | SAP TechEd Virtual!

In the session catalogs for the in-person and the virtual event, you will find a wide range of topics across various tracks. If you are interested in all the latest news around the SAP Cloud Application Programming Model (CAP), let me guide you through my recommendations.

Keynote

KEY100 | Beyond the hype: How SAP is supercharging developers for what's next

Some experts argue there‚Äôs a developer shortage. Others will say developers are no longer needed due to AI. Let‚Äôs get real: developers, architects, and technologists are here to stay, and their roles are more important than ever. Explore how the latest technology, tools, AI, agents, and learning from SAP can help you adapt these changing roles.

This session is also available virtually: KEY100v.

Strategy Talk

ST116 | SAP Build for all: A shift toward AI-assisted developer-centric tools

Explore the most recent innovations in SAP Build solutions that help developers to create extensions, applications, and automations. Learn how enhancements in the development environment, SAP Cloud Application Programming Model, and Joule copilot empower customers and partners to build extensions efficiently at scale.

This session is also available virtually: ST116v.

Roadmap Sessions

AD820 | Future of app dev in SAP Build: Simplifying Clean Core & LoB extensions‚Äã

Check out upcoming enhancements to SAP Build solutions involving SAP‚Äôs professional developer tools, the Joule copliot, SAP Cloud Application Programming Model, SAPUI5, and SAP Fiori apps. These updates boost developer productivity, support clean core, and improve extensibility for line-of-business (LoB) apps, advancing enterprise app development.

This session is also available virtually: AD820v.

Deep Dive Sessions

AD101 | Integration of SAP Business Data Cloud with CAP and SAP Build‚Äã

The SAP Business Data Cloud solution unifies SAP and third-party data, and SAP Build solutions let you discover and use data products in the service center and consume them in apps based on SAP Cloud Application Programming Model (CAP). Get details on sharing data from these apps and using built-in tools for service-level integration.

AD203 | Fact checking UI Extensibility on top of CAP/RAP: What's in it for you?‚Äã

SAPUI5 flexibility lets you extend SAP Fiori apps in a clean core approach. Key users use drag-and-drop tools while developers add custom code with visual editors and the Joule copilot. See how SAP Cloud Application Programming Model and ABAP RESTful application programming model help extend data models and add custom logic in SAP Build solutions.

Hands-On Workshops:

AD160 | Get Hands-On with Joule: Boost Your SAP Build Development with AI‚Äã

The SAP Joule for Developers add-on brings AI capabilities directly into SAP Build solutions to support your development process. Get hands-on experience using AI-driven tools to boost your productivity in SAP Cloud Application Programming Model and UI development, with features designed to simplify your workflow and help you build faster and smarter.                                                                            

AD161 | Integration of SAP Business Data Cloud with CAP and SAP Build‚Äã

Get hands-on experience with the SAP Business Data Cloud and SAP Build solutions to find out how to discover and use data products in apps based on SAP Cloud Application Programming Model (CAP). Practice sharing data from CAP apps and using built-in tools for service integration and SAP HANA‚Äìbased data federation.

AD260 | UI Extensibility on top of CAP/RAP: What's in it for you?‚Äã

SAPUI5 flexibility lets you extend SAP Fiori apps with a clean core approach. Key users and developers can add custom code with visual editors and Joule technology. See how SAP Cloud Application Programming Model and the ABAP RESTful application programming model support extending data models and adding custom logic in the SAP Build solution.

DT265 | Provision and extend multitenant solutions based on CAP for SAP Cloud ERP‚Äã

Experience how to provision, configure, and extend multitenant solutions based on SAP Business Technology Platform and the SAP Cloud Application Programming Model (CAP) for SAP Cloud ERP. Using a reference example, you‚Äôll explore how to deliver customer-specific extensions on a scalable and resource-efficient multitenant architecture.

 

We can‚Äôt wait to see you at SAP TechEd 2025, either in Berlin or virtually!

entry.title: SAP Developer News October 30th, 2025
entry.content:
DESCRIPTION 

PODCAST: https://podcast.opensap.info/sap-developers/2025/10/30/sap-developer-news-october-30th-2025/ 

 

Devtoberfest Digest 

  • Devtoberfest Digest: https://url.sap/devtoberfest-digest 

 

Documentation collaboration and contributions 

  • Building Enterprise Grade CAP applications using BTP Developer's guide https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tUKMUIL9C6k  
  • Get to know more about CAP‚Äôs documentation offering https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gvjbxitDf18 
  • SAP BTP Developers Guide https://help.sap.com/docs/btp/btp-developers-guide/btp-developers-guide 
  • Open Documentation Initiative (podcast episode) https://podcast.opensap.info/open-source-way/2021/11/24/the-open-documentation-initiative-the-gold-standard-of-collaborative-documentation/  
  • Runtime Comparison Guide https://help.sap.com/docs/btp/comparison-btp-runtimes/runtime-comparison 

 

SAP TechEd 

  • Event Page: https://www.sap.com/events/teched.html 

 

SAP Community Voice 

  • October SAP Community Voice Post: https://community.sap.com/t5/what-s-new/sap-community-voice-get-ready-for-sap-teched-certifications-and-upcoming/ba-p/14255481 
  • Video Playlist: https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLpQebylHrdh5ZmJeJXl_pC9n7LcsfFjrZ&si=gr0wPQhCkXiWHhLC 

 

CHAPTER TITLES  

0:00 Intro 

0:10 Devtoberfest Digest 

2:13 Documentation collaboration and contributions 

4:03 SAP TechEd  

4:36 SAP Community Voice 

 

TRANSCRIPTION

[Intro] This is the SAP Developer News for October 30th, 2025.

[Antonio & Javier] Hola, SAP Developers. We just wrapped up Devtoberfest last week, but I know that many of you are still trying to catch up with all the great content that's part of Devtoberfest. Well, my friend Javier here developed a very nice tool called Devtoberfest Digest that can help you with this. Javier, can you share with us a bit about what Devtoberfest Digest is and what was your motivation to develop it? Hello, this is Javier Martin from the BTP solution advisory team in Spain. And well, the Devtoberfest Digest is an AI-powered solution that kind of watches all the sessions that you deliver on the event and magically extracts the relevant information from the different videos so you can get the key points and relevant data for your interests. Perfect. And what was your motivation to develop it? Well, my motivation, yeah, let's say that I heard that there was some new MCP servers that was already released, like the CAP and the Fiori MCP servers, so I wanted to test them out. And, well, I was kind of struggling with time, right, to follow all the great sessions, so just the idea came really quickly. Fantastic. And what are some of the technologies that power Devtoberfest Digest? So for the backend, I use CAP, a cloud application programming model. There is Fiori as well for the frontend, HANA Cloud for persistence. And I'm also using the orchestration service from the generative failure hub for LLM access. Nice. And where is it that everyone can access this tool? Yeah, so the tool is already developed on the BTP. We already created a short URL for you guys to consume it and well, I hope you find it useful. I'm sure I will find it useful because there are many sessions that I still need to catch up. Definitely. So thank you very much for sharing this with the community and I hope you all enjoy it. Thank you. Ciao.

[DJ] Here is a shout out to all you lovely content collaborators. During Devtoberfest, we had a couple of great sessions on documentation and documentation contributions. Ren√© and Mahadi gave us a great overview of the CAP documentation and explained the different ways you can get involved by sharing feedback or contributing content. Gopal talked about enterprise-grade capabilities for CAP apps with information based upon the SAP BTP Developers Guide, which is also open for collaboration as well. Don't forget that the Open Documentation Initiative is still very much alive and well, with plenty of documentation sets. In fact, there's been a recent edition of the Runtime Comparison Guide, and there are also still contribution badges to be earned, as well as just cool points from having your GitHub avatar listed in the repo. Alternatively, you can also just leave a question or comment directly on the relevant page in the SAP Help Portal if you wish‚Äîthe choice is yours. By the way, talking of the SAP BTP Developers Guide, this has had some updates and improvements recently. There's a new strengths and benefits section for all major runtimes, there's a new security guide with info for all the different relevant aspects or development phases of CAP development. And there's also a new section on developing software-as-a-service offerings, especially interesting, I suppose, for SAP partners and other software vendors. Anyway, have a look at the documentation and get involved.

[Tom] You might have noticed that the SAP Developer News was a little lighter this week. Well, that's probably because next week is SAP TechEd. And of course, who would have news about a new release or a new feature coming out just the week before TechEd? Of course, we're going to have tons of news from SAP TechEd virtual and Berlin and TechEd on tour. So be on the lookout for special episodes of the SAP Developer News next week, live from Berlin. We will bring you all the updates and announcements from the event. But speaking of SAP TechEd, we also have the Community Voice. And this is a new offering, kind of a monthly newsletter format to keep you abreast of all things that are going on in the SAP community. This month, they have a lot of information to help you get ready for TechEd and get the most out of it. They also have a wrap-up of Devtoberfest, information about new certifications, blog highlights, all kinds of good content. So be sure to check that out. Make a great thing to read as you're getting ready to travel to SAP TechEd or SAP TechEd on tour. And if you are going to be there in Berlin next week or Sydney or India later in the month, we look forward to seeing you there. So until then, have a great trip and a great TechEd.

entry.title: My Expert Playlist - SAP TechEd 2025
entry.content:
Hello, dear influencers, experts, and friends from the SAP Community!

It‚Äôs finally that time of the year again: SAP TechEd Season!
This year feels extra special to me‚Äîit‚Äôs the first SAP TechEd happening in Germany since I moved here, and I couldn‚Äôt be more excited.

When it comes to building my personal TechEd agenda, it has never been both so easy and so difficult at the same time.

Why difficult?
Because my curiosity is endless. Over my (long) SAP career, I‚Äôve worked across many areas: from writing ABAP code to designing modern user interfaces, from integration to solution and enterprise architecture‚Äîwhere technology truly meets business. I love exploring how technology and business merge, so naturally, I‚Äôd like to attend almost every session across the board.

Why easy?
Because priorities are clear this year: AI.
My laser focus will be on everything around custom AI scenarios‚Äîhow we as engineers can build AI extensions, create and extend Joule AI agents, and leverage the SAP AI Foundation. I believe many of the new challenges (and opportunities!) will emerge here, and I can‚Äôt wait to discover how SAP‚Äôs newest innovations will empower us.

That said, I‚Äôve shortlisted around 30 sessions I‚Äôd love to attend. Realistically, some I‚Äôll have to catch later via SAP TechEd Virtual‚Äîbut here are my Top 3 ‚Äúmust-watch‚Äù sessions:

 

My Top 3 SAP TechEd 2025 Sessions

  • CT1245 | Hugging Face Transformers in AI Foundation
    I‚Äôm learning to use Hugging Face models, so I‚Äôm curious to see how they work within the SAP AI Foundation. This feels like a new superpower for building advanced AI scenarios.

  • AI160 | Build your own AI agent‚Äìbased solution with the generative AI hub
    Agents are another game-changing technology. Spending two hours diving deep into building custom AI agents to extend SAP products sounds like time very well invested.

  • PAR102 | From MCP to Joule: Unlocking SAP data and AI innovation with Microsoft
    I‚Äôve been exploring how SAP AI Foundation can be integrated with cloud providers beyond the Generative AI Hub. This session will be a great opportunity to hear directly from Microsoft experts on their approach.

  • Bonus: AI101 | Optimize prompts and explore models with the generative AI hub
    Prompt engineering is one of the core skills for creating effective custom AI solutions. This session promises plenty of practical insights to sharpen that skill.

Of course, I wish I could attend everything‚Äîbut thankfully, many sessions will be available later via SAP TechEd Virtual.

In addition to the AI-focused ones, I‚Äôll also keep a close eye on all sessions related to Joule in the context of ABAP and CAP development‚Äîbecause at the end of the day, AI custom scenarios often start right there (with a little help from Python).

Final Thoughts

To all my fellow SAP Community colleagues:
I wish you an inspiring and knowledge-packed SAP TechEd season. May your curiosity be fueled and your learning appetite at least partly satisfied.

Let‚Äôs keep in touch and exchange our learnings in the weeks to come.

All the best,
Douglas
